basics.name: Sam Manibog
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a computer science student pursuing a B.S. at the University of Hawaii. I will graduate in Spring, 2028, after which I plan to pursue a career in creative software development.

work.company: University of Hawaii at Manoa Mathematics Department
work.summary: Grade assignments from an upper division course (Linear Algebra and Applications to Differential Equations)
highlights: Provide feedback on and grade submitted assignments.
Manage, edit, and steward sensitive academic Information.

volunteer.summary: Operate and maintain live audio equipment.
highlights: Mix audio balance during live performances, speeches.
Set up and troubleshoot complex equipment.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0.
